participant_1.background:
My family is proud of my decision to become a police officer.
I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
my son was born completely blind.

participant_2.background:
I think the most difficult thing I've ever done was to leave my home country and move to a new one.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i enjoy reading and walking on sunny days.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams.
i have went to mexico 4 times this year.

content.text: Hey! What's up?
Hey! Not much, just got home from work. How about you?
Same here, just finished up my shift as a police officer. It was pretty busy today.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of work. I'm sure you're tired.
Yeah, I'm a little beat. But it's worth it to keep my community safe.
I'm sure it is. I'm glad you're doing something you're passionate about.
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a librarian. I love it! It's so much fun helping people find the information they need.
That sounds really cool! I love libraries. I used to go to the library all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! I loved reading books when I was younger.
What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think my favorite book is probably "The Little Prince."
Oh, I love that book! It's so beautiful.
Me too! It's one of those books that you can read over and over again and always find something new.
I agree! It's such a special book.
It is! I'm glad you like it.
Thanks for talking to me! I really enjoyed it.
Me too! It was nice to meet you.
You too! Have a great night!
You too!
